docs.snippet: Discriminating against people on the basis of their nationality is illegal, the U.N. High Commissioner for Human Rights said on Twitter on Monday, referring to U.S. President Donald Trump's travel ban on nationals from seven Middle Eastern countri...
docs.lead_paragraph: Discriminating against people on the basis of their nationality is illegal, the U.N. High Commissioner for Human Rights said on Twitter on Monday, referring to U.S. President Donald Trump's travel ban on nationals from seven Middle Eastern countries.

headline.main: U.N. Rights Chief Says Trump's Travel Ban Is Illegal
headline.print_headline: U.N. Rights Chief Says Trump's Travel Ban Is Illegal

docs.snippet: The U.S. Olympic Committee said on Monday they were told by the U.S. government that President Donald Trump's ban on visitors from some Muslim-majority countries should not impact athletes traveling to the United States for international events....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Olympic Committee said on Monday they were told by the U.S. government that President Donald Trump's ban on visitors from some Muslim-majority countries should not impact athletes traveling to the United States for international events.

headline.main: USOC Say Foreign Athletes Not Affected by Trump Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: USOC Say Foreign Athletes Not Affected by Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: U.S. wrestlers plan to be at next month's World Cup in Iran despite that country's claim that it would ban American visitors in retaliation to President Donald Trump's controversial immigration order, USA Wrestling said on Monday....

docs.snippet: In the face of widespread criticism, President Donald Trump and other member of his administration have staunchly defended his order temporarily banning refugees and nearly all citizens from seven Muslim-majority countries. But in a statement Sund...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the face of widespread criticism, President Donald Trump and other member of his administration have staunchly defended his order temporarily banning refugees and nearly all citizens from seven Muslim-majority countries. But in a statement Sunday, tweets Monday and comments Tuesday, Trump and others misstated the facts or offered contradictory statements multiple times.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Trump Claims on Travel Ban Misleading, Wrong
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Trump Claims on Travel Ban Misleading, Wrong
